languages.text: "Ирлиэт, потрудись объяснить своему сородичу, что он зря кипятится".
"Yrliet, kindly explain to your kinsman that there is no reason for him to be so riled up."
languages.original_text: "Ирлиэт, потрудись объяснить своему сородичу, что он зря кипятится".

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, kindly explain to your fellow kinsman that there is no reason for his fuming."
"Yrliet, kindly explain to your fellow kinsman that there is no reason for his fuming."
"Yrliet, kindly explain to your fellow kinsman that there is no reason for him to be fuming."
"Yrliet, kindly explain to your fellow kinsman that there is no reason for him to be fuming."
"Yrliet, kindly explain to your kinsman that there is no reason for him to be so riled up."
"Yrliet, kindly explain to your kinsman that there is no reason for him to be so riled up."

languages.text: “伊莉耶特，你和你的族人解释一下吧，他没理由和我耍臭脾气。”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, kindly explain to your kinsman that there is no reason for him to be so riled up."

traits.locale_text: “伊莉耶特，你和你的族人解释一下吧，他没理由和我耍脾气。”

languages.text: 「ユリエット、そんなに怒る理由はないと、親切に説明してやってくれ」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, kindly explain to your kinsman that there is no reason for him to be so riled up."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエット、そんなに怒る理由はないと、親切に説明してやってくれ」

languages.text: «Yrliet, explícale a tu congénere que no tiene razón para ponerse así».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, kindly explain to your kinsman that there is no reason for him to be so riled up."

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet, explícale a tu pariente que no tiene razón para echar humo así».

languages.text: "Yrliet, bitte erklärt Eurem Verwandten, dass es keinen Grund für ihn gibt, so zu kochen."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, kindly explain to your kinsman that there is no reason for him to be so riled up."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, bitte erklärt Eurem Verwandten, dass es keinen Grund für ihn gibt, so zu kochen."

languages.text: « Yrliet, auriez-vous l'obligeance d'expliquer à votre cousin qu'il n'a aucune raison de fulminer de la sorte ? »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, kindly explain to your kinsman that there is no reason for him to be so riled up."

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet, auriez-vous l'obligeance d'expliquer à votre camarade qu'il n'a aucune raison de fulminer de la sorte ? »

languages.text: "Yrliet, şu soydaşına söyler misin lütfen... Durduk yere coşmasın."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, kindly explain to your kinsman that there is no reason for him to be so riled up."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, şu soydaşına söyler misin lütfen, durduk yere coşmasın."
